description.en:
BlackCoin started of as a Proof of Work coin but has evolved to a unique version of Proof of Stake. Wallet users can unlock wallet for staking only.

BlackCoin features the following specifications:

- Extremely secure: Among first with fix on SSL heartbeat, Transaction malleability, BIP66
- The probability to sign a block and the block reward does not depend on coinage (anymore).
- Recommended confirmations: 10, maturity: 500
- Minimum transaction fee: 0.0001 BLK 
- Defined block time target: 64 seconds
- Max reorganization depth: 500 blocks
- Inflation: about 0.95%.
- PoS block reward: 1.5 BLK + fees
- The accumulated reward is proportional to the total balance and the time of staking. 24/7 staking at current network weight leads to an expected reward ratio (interest rate) of about 5%.
- BlackCoin rewards users who supports the blockchain through continuous staking.

status_updates.description: #Blackcoin - Pure Proof Of Stake - since 2014. We are a truly decentralized and open source platform with community members from all over the world. $BLK can easily be integrated into any exchange or (mobile)wallet. No permission required! Protocol info can be found here: https://blackcoin.org

Blackcoin community members,

Please update your Blackcoin More wallet to the most recent version, released on Feb 24th 2021
version v2.13.2.8-10bb345e7 has been released and will solve the Atomic Swap bug.

If you still run the older v1.2.x wallet or BlackHalo, there is a big chance you are not able to sync anymore (or even forked).
Please migrate to Blackcoin More! how? https://blackcoin.nl/dump-and-import-wallet-private-keys/

Download it from https://blackcoinmore.org

Very important software upgrade for all Blackcoin users!

Blackcoin has released Blackcoin More v2.13.2.7. Very important that EVERYONE upgrades, to mitigate large dust transactions in the mempool. Please download from blackcoinmore.org #Blackcoin $BLK

Changelog: https://gitlab.com/blackcoin/blackcoin-more/-/releases/v2.13.2.7

We have dedicated a separate website to the Blackcoin More client. This client can be used as wallet and can also be used to stake your coins! We encourage people running older versions to upgrade $BLK #Blackcoin https://blackcoinmore.org

Blackcoin and Radium Core devs form a strategic alliance. Both blockchains share similar codebases so it makes sense to collaborate:

-Work together on future codebase upgrades
-Share industry knowledge
-Innovate PoS technology

#pos #proofofstake #fintech #blockchain

#Blackcoin #Community The most recent version (v2.13.2.6 build 2331516f6) of the Blackcoin More software can now be downloaded from https://blackcoinmore.org. For feedback please visit our support channels. #HappyStaking $BLK #WeAreCrypto

Hello Blackcoin Community

Starting today, we will also announce Blackcoin news via CoinGecko Beam! 

Please join us via follow the social media and support channels:
- https://twitter.com/BlackcoinOrg
- https://t.me/blackcoinnl
- https://discord.gg/hjNUgWD

Hope to see you there!

Michel van Kessel
